backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria reaches the final after defeating South Africa on penalties.

text: Nkwanta North records first Mpox case - District Health Director.
translated: Nkwanta North kọ àkọsílẹ̀ àìsàn Mpox àkọ́kọ́ - Olùdarí Ìlera Ìpínlẹ̀.
backtranslated: Nkwanta North wrote the first report of Mpox disease - State Health Director.

text: 'Calculated attempt to divide us' – Appiagyei slams move to replace Afenyo-Markin at ECOWAS Parliament.
translated: 'Ìgbìyànjú tí a ṣe láti pín wa'  Appiagyei ṣagbátẹrù ìyípadà Afenyo-Markin nínú Ìgbìmọ̀ Àjọ ECOWAS.
backtranslated: The 'attempt to divide' Appiagyei has encouraged the Afenyo-Markin change in the ECOWAS Council.

text: Ridge Hospital: One arrested in connection with assault on health workers.
translated: Ilé Ìwòsàn Ridge: A mú ẹnìkan nítorí ìkọlù àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìlera.
backtranslated: Ridge Hospital: One person arrested for assaulting health workers.

text: R2Bees storm Accra Technical University on July 18 for WatsUp on campus.
translated: R2Bees jà ní Yunifásítì Akọ̀wé Akọ̀wé ní July 18 fún WatsUp ní ilé ẹ̀kọ́.
backtranslated: R2Bees fought at the University of Akureyri on July 18 for WatsUp at the school.

text: Bawku SHS shut down after the fatal shooting of a final-year student.
translated: Ilé Ìṣọ́ Bawku ti pa lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n ti yìnbọn pa ọmọ ilé ìwé kan tó ń kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní ọdún kẹyìn.
backtranslated: Bawku Watch Tower was closed after a student in his last year was shot dead.

text: Pharmaceutical distributor fined GH¢1.
translated: Wọ́n fi GH¢1 san ìtanràn fún olùpínṣẹ́ oògùn.
backtranslated: The drug dealer was fined GH¢1.

text: How can Partey rape one woman three times? – Kankam Boadu questions charges.
translated: Báwo ni Partey ṣe lè fipá bá obìnrin kan lòpọ̀ ìgbà?  Kankam Boadu ṣiyèméjì lórí ẹ̀sùn náà.
backtranslated: How could Partey rape a woman multiple times? Kankam Boadu doubted the charge.

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Tons of commendations for Appiatse’s rebirth.
translated: Àkọlé nípa Ghanaian Times: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìyìn fún ìbílẹ̀ àtúnwá Appiatse.
backtranslated: Ghanaian Times article: Much praise for the rebirth of the Appiatse culture.

text: 'I was persecuted' - ACP Agordzo gives blow-by-blow account on alleged coup trial.
translated: "A ṣe inúnibíni sí mi" - ACP Agordzo sọ ìtàn àtẹ̀yìnwá nípa ẹjọ́ tí wọ́n sọ pé ó jẹ́ ti ìyípadà ìjọba.
backtranslated: "I was persecuted" - ACP Agordzo tells the story of the recent trial of the alleged coup.

text: Prof Ransford Gyampo reveals why he accepted Mahama's call to serve after several offers.
translated: Àmọ́, ó ní kí àwọn ọmọ ẹ̀yìn òun máa ṣe ohun tí àwọn ọmọ ẹ̀yìn òun ń ṣe.
backtranslated: Rather, he asked his followers to imitate him.

text: Bankrogya community isolated by floodwaters, cries for basic infrastructure.
translated: Ìjọ Bankrogya tí omi àkúnya ti ya sọ́tọ̀, ń ké fún ìpìlẹ̀ ìkọ́lé.
backtranslated: The Bankrogya Congregation, which was torn apart by flood waters, is calling for a foundation.

text: Uganda in talks to import all its oil via Tanzania.
translated: Uganda ń bá àwọn olùbánisọ̀rọ̀ sọ̀rọ̀ láti kó gbogbo epo rẹ̀ wá láti Tanzania.
backtranslated: Uganda is in talks with the media to import all its oil from Tanzania.

text: Movement for Change shuts down NPP comeback claims.
translated: Movement for Change ti pa àwọn ìpolongo ìmúpadà NPP.
backtranslated: The Movement for Change has stopped the NPP reform campaigns.

text: Frimpong-Manso Institute mourns victims of devastating helicopter crash.
translated: Ilé-ìwé Frimpong-Manso ń ṣọ̀fọ̀ àwọn tí ọkọ̀ òfúrufú tó bà jẹ́ pa.
backtranslated: Frimpong-Manso School mourns the victims of the plane crash.

text: You are sick if you have protruding stomach - Dr Dominic Nitiwul.
translated: O ti ṣàìsàn bí o bá ní àyà tó ń yọ. - Dókítà Dominic Nitiwul.
backtranslated: You are sick if you have a chest infection. - Dr. Dominic Nitiwul.

text: Alhaji Grusah drops match fixing allegations claims against Dreams FC.
translated: Alhaji Grusah jáwọ́ nínú ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kan Dream FC nípa fífi àdììtú bá wọn jà.
backtranslated: Alhaji Grusah has withdrawn from the accusation against Dream FC of having fought them in a secret battle.

text: Ghanaians urged to resolve disputes peacefully.
translated: Àwọn ará Ghana rọ̀ wá pé kí wọ́n yanjú àwọn àríyànjiyàn wọn lọ́nà àlàáfíà.
backtranslated: The Ghanaians urged us to settle their differences peacefully.

translated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad ni akọrin ninu idije badminton ti Tebel All Ghana ti ọdun 2024.
backtranslated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad are the champions in the badminton competition of Tebel All Ghana 2024.

translated: Kí nìdí tí wọn ò fi mú Kevin Taylor?
backtranslated: Why was Kevin Taylor not arrested?

backtranslated: Delkie says that Ghanaian men are not good at playing.

text: COVID-19: Mass vaccination ahead of Christmas begins December 14-18 - GHS.
translated: COVID-19: Ìgbésẹ̀ ìgbagbágbo ṣáájú ọdún Kérésìmesì bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní December 14-18 - GHS.
backtranslated: COVID-19: Pre-Christmas campaign started from 14-18 December - GHS

text: Accra Mayor pledges Hockey support.
translated: Olú ìlú Accra ṣèlérí ìtìlẹ́yìn fún ẹ̀gbẹ́ hockey.
backtranslated: The capital Accra pledged support for the hockey team.

translated: COVID-19: Gbogbo ènìyàn ti ṣètò fún ìfilọ́lẹ̀ abéèkejì ní Àgbègbè Ashanti.
backtranslated: COVID-19: All public has been scheduled for the launch of the secondary vaccine in Ashanti Region.

text: Peace Council condemns violence at Ablekuma North, calls for calm.
translated: Ìgbìmọ̀ Àlàáfíà dá ìwà ipá ní Ablekuma North lẹ́bi, ó sì ké sí àwọn aráàlú pé kí wọ́n wà ní àlàáfíà.
backtranslated: The Peace Committee condemned the violence in Ablekuma North and called on the citizens to remain peaceful.

text: Nigeria's Maduka Okoye banned two months for match fixing.
translated: Maduka Okoye ọmọ Nàìjíríà ni wọn ti fi oṣù méjì lẹ́wọ̀n nítorí pé ó fi àdììtú bá àwọn eléré ìdárayá.

text: EL calls for peace with DopeNation after years of misunderstanding.

backtranslated: The officials have issued a "warning" over the poor condition of the foundations of Janga Technical School.

text: Elders of Djetsorkope present newly installed chief to Osudoku Traditional Council.
translated: Àwọn àgbààgbà ìlú Djetsorkope ń fi olórí tuntun tí wọ́n yàn sípò han Ìgbìmọ̀ Àṣà Ìbílẹ̀ Osudoku.
backtranslated: Djetsorkope elders presenting the newly elected head of the Osudoku County Cultural Committee.

text: We are aiming to win bronze medal against Senegal - Sudan coach Kwesi Appiah.
translated: A fẹ́ gba àmì bàbà lọ́wọ́ olùkọ́ni Senegal àti Sudan, Kwesi Appiah.
backtranslated: We want to win the bronze medal from the coach of Senegal and Sudan, Kwesi Appiah.

text: Kudus, Semenyo make official EPL Team of the Week after impressive opening week.
translated: Kudus, Semenyo di Ẹgbẹ EPL ti Osu lẹyin ọsẹ akọkọ ti o wuyi.
backtranslated: Kudus, Semenyo became the EPL Team of the Week after an impressive first week.

text: Sofo Azorka should have been arrested by the police – Nana Boakye.
translated: Sofo Azorka yẹ ki awọn ọlọpaa mu  Nana Boakye.

translated: Ìdáhùn ní Ọjọ́bọ: Ìsọfúnni lórí Daasebre Dwamena.

backtranslated: 2022 In Search: Celebrity weddings that take the storm.

text: FLASHBACK: Watch as NDC member threatens, curses Hawa Koomson over 2024 election violence.
translated: FÁLÁ: Ẹ wo bí ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ NDC ṣe ń halẹ̀ mọ́ Hawa Koomson lórí ìwà ipá ìbò ọdún 2024.
backtranslated: FYI: Watch how NDC member threatens Hawa Koomson over the violence of the 2024 election.

translated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang ni àwọn tí a yàn sípò àkọ́kọ́ fún àwọn ẹ̀bùn ọmọdé tó dára jùlọ.
backtranslated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang are the first nominees for the best children's awards.

text: Why January is generally an economically difficult month.
translated: Ìdí tí oṣù January fi jẹ́ oṣù tó nira fún ètò ọrọ̀ ajé.
backtranslated: Why January was a difficult month for the economy.

text: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, new Director-General of CID trailblazing law enforcement and legal advocacy.

backtranslated: Greet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, the new Director General of CID who is directing the law enforcement and law enforcement campaign.

translated: Ìpinnu ọmọdé ni - Obiri Boahen bẹnu àtẹ́ lu NPP fún dídá àwọn ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú sílẹ̀.
backtranslated: It was a childish decision - Obiri Boahen criticized the NPP for forming political parties.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ghana has lost a potential president in Omane Boamah – Ebo Whyte.
translated: Helicopter Crash: Ghana ti pàdánù ààrẹ kan tó lè jẹ́ ààrẹ ní Omane Boamah  Ebo Whyte.

backtranslated: THE MORNING: Kwaku Dawuro presents the political show The Movement in the Morning.

text: I don't mind if Ghanaians want to vote a president for more than two terms – Freddie Blay.
translated: Mi ò bìkítà bí àwọn ará Ghana bá fẹ́ dìbò fún ààrẹ fún àkókò tó ju ìgbà méjì lọ  Freddie Blay.
backtranslated: I don't care if the Ghanaians want to elect Freddie Blay for more than two terms.

text: Students Loan Trust Fund warns against unauthorised use of Logo on billboards.
translated: Àjọ Student Loan Trust Fund kìlọ̀ fún àwọn tí kò gbà láti lo Logo lórí àwọn pákó ìpolówó ọjà.
backtranslated: The Student Loan Trust Fund warns against refusing to use the Logo on billboards.

translated: Olùgbé ní South Africa tọrọ àforíjì lórí fídíò iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n gbé jáde ní Russia.
backtranslated: A South African apologizes for a video of a job that was broadcast in Russia.

backtranslated: Highlights from Dr Bawumia's speech after leaving his name.

text: Hearts of Oak coach Didi Dramani stresses determination to bring ‘sustainability and success' to the club.
translated: Olùdarí Hearts of Oak, Didi Dramani tẹnumọ ìpinnu láti mú "ìdúróṣinṣin àti àṣeyọrí " wá sí ẹgbẹ́ náà.

translated: Minisita fun ere idaraya da iṣẹ-ṣiṣe ti ko ni ofin duro ti awọn ẹya ti ile-iṣẹ ere idaraya Borteyman.
backtranslated: The Minister for Sport suspended the illegal operation of the Borteyman sports club.

text: Exiled Across the Ocean: How the British banished Agyemang Prempeh I and his chiefs to Seychelles.
translated: Àìmọye èèyàn ló ń gbé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Seychelles.

translated: Minisita fun ilera gbe Egbegbe Ile-igbimọ Oogun Ghana si ile-igbimọ naa.
backtranslated: The Minister of Health moved the Ghana Medical Council to the Parliament.

text: Ghanaians can travel to these 4 countries without visas after Parliament's ratification.
translated: Àwọn ará Ghana lè rìnrìn àjò lọ sí àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́rin yìí láìní ìwé àtìlẹ́yìn, lẹ́yìn tí Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣòfin bá fọwọ́ sí i.
